changelog.md.Envoi automatique de la configuration au: Automatic sending of the configuration to the market during installation
changelog.md.Suppression du mode securisé suite à la: Deletion of secure mode following the deletion of the identifier on the google side
changelog.md.Ajout de l'information sur l'abonnement: Adding subscription information to voice services
changelog.md.a partir du 01\/06\/2019 les services vo: from 01/06/2019 the voice services become chargeable, you can see your status on your profile page on the market, tab my services
changelog.md.Mise à jour de la documentation pour pré: Documentation update to clarify google timeout
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur le test de conne: Correction of a bug on the connection test under firefox
changelog.md.Ajout d'un bouton pour envoyer la config: Add a button to automatically send the configuration to the market

index.md.Le plugin dialogflow permet de connecter: The dialogflow plugin makes it possible to connect Jeedom to Google Home / Assistant by a native application and interactions
index.md.Il existe aussi le plugin Google Smartho: There is also the Google Smarthome plugin which allows you to connect Jeedom to Google Home / Assistant but this time for the sake of Google’s Smarthome integration, it therefore does not use interactions
index.md.Le plugin necessite un abonnement aux se: The plugin requires a subscription to voice services
index.md.En mode cloud (et uniquement en mode clo: In cloud mode (and only in cloud mode), there are synchronization delays during the following actions
index.md.Achat d'année sur le service Assistant V: Purchase of year on the Voice Assistant service
index.md.Changement de clef api du plugin Google: Change of API smarthome plugin API key
index.md.Installez le plugin et activez-le: Install the plugin and activate it
index.md.Ensuite toujours sur la page de configur: Then always on the plugin configuration page click on "Send" to send your configuration to the market
index.md.Vous n'avez pas à créer d'équipement pou: You don't have to create any equipment for this plugin
index.md.Sur le market il vous faut activer \"Goo: On the market, you must activate "Google Smarthome" in the "My Services" tab then "Configure" on the "Voice assistant" line from your profiles and wait until the status changes to active (it takes about 6 hours)
index.md.L'url d'accès de votre jeedom doit absol: The access url of your jeedom must absolutely be in https
index.md.Vous ne pouvez connecter que un seul Jee: You can only connect one Jeedom to Google per market account
index.md.Suite à l'activation et\/ou modification: Following the activation and / or modification of information for Google Smarthome you must
index.md.pour que cela soit prise en compte: for this to be taken into account
index.md.Sur un téléphone avec Google Assistant,: On a phone with Google Assistant, say "Speak with Jeedom", Google will tell you to link your Jeedom account and Google click on yes
index.md.Google va vous indiquer que la configura: Google will tell you that the configuration is successfully created / updated
index.md.Voilà, le lien entre votre Jeedom et Goo: Here, the link between your Jeedom and Google Home / Assistant is made
index.md.Vous pouvez maintenant parler à votre Je: You can now talk to your Jeedom and use all the interactions of your Jeedom directly from your Google Home / Assistant
index.md.Depuis votre Google Home\/Assistant, dit: From your Google Home / Assistant, just say "Talk to Jeedom", "Ask Jeedom" or even "Say to Jeedom" to start interaction with Jeedom and "Thank you" when you're done to end the conversation
index.md.Le mode sécurisé rajoute une couche d'au: Secure mode adds an authorization layer at Jeedom
index.md.Par defaut seul la clef API est nécessai: By default only the API key is necessary in secure mode there is a 2nd unique character string per user (not stored completely in the database) which must be valid
index.md.Pour s'en servir rien de plus simple il: To use it nothing simpler you must go to the plugin configuration page and activate the secure mode, then make a request to Google for Jeedom
index.md.Enfin aller sur la page Plugin -> Commun: Finally go to the Plugin -> Communication -> Dialogflow page. You will see a request for acceptance of an identifier, just validate it.
index.md.Le mode sécurisé n'est pas actif par déf: The secure mode is not active by default to be able to pass the Google validation but it is strongly advised to activate it
index.md.Si vous avez mis une mauvais URL ou clef: If you have put a wrong URL or API key or a change of URL or API key, you must reset the configuration and redo the connection procedure.
index.md.Ensuite sur l'application Google Assista: Then on the Google Assistant application, say "Talk to Jeedom" then "Delete configuration
index.md.L'application devrait vous dire que la c: The application should tell you that the configuration is deleted successfully
index.md.C'est que votre URL ou la clef API confi: Is that your URL or API key configured on the market is not good
index.md.Attention aussi au délai de réponse défi: Also pay attention to the response time defined in the interactions, Google imposes a response time before timeout of 4 seconds
index.md.Lors d'un \"parler a jeedom\" vous recev: During a "talk to jeedom" you IMMEDIATELY receive an "Error your configuration server did not respond correctly
index.md.Merci d'aller voir la documentation code: Please go to the documentation code 500
index.md.com), sur cette page selectionnez votre: com), on this page select your Google account (the one used by Google Home / Assistant) in "Service ID" put jeedom-183212 and click on "Unlink my account" (button on the right)
index.md.Ensuite dans Google Assistant refaite la: Then in Google Assistant redo the configuration (except market part)
index.md.Erreur votre Jeedom n'a pas répondu corr: Error your Jeedom did not answer correctly ETIMEDOUT code
index.md.Cela vient de votre Jeedom qui n'a pas r: This comes from your Jeedom which did not respond within the time limit (imposed by Google)
index.md.Cela peut venir de 2 choses, une connexi: It can come from 2 things, a slow internet connection, or actions that take too long.
index.md.A chaque demande Google vous indique que: At each request Google indicates that your configuration has been updated
index.md.C'est que Google ne reconnait pas votre: Is that Google does not recognize your voice so it considers you as a new user
index.md.Pour corriger vous pouvez essayer de rec: To correct you can try to reconfigure voice match
